website_summaries.verdict: An upgraded version of the popular classic.
pros: Easy-to-use 3-button operation is the same as the original
Generation building gameplay is engaging and interesting

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price for a used looking Tamagotchi
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for the release of an English color Tamagotchi and am very happy to finally have one in my hands, except, well, it looks very used. It looks like someone took a needle and scratched the ever loving hell out of the screen, two of these scratches are deep and very noticeable even with the screen turned on and can be a bit distracting. Aside from it's outer condition, it at least it works fine, and if you don't mind beat up looking devices, it's a very entertaining little toy. Just hoping mine was a fluke and no one else ends up with one that looked like this.
customer_reviews.author: henz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Fun, Very Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Works perfectly. But... the screen came pre-scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Tamagotchi On
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the Tamagotchi P in the past and was so excited to hear about the Meets/On coming to America. I was disappointed to see that my tamagotchi came with some light scratches on the outer back shell and a some markings on the screen, despite it being new.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest! Brings me back to my childhood. I've wanted one of these colored Tamagotchis for a while but they were all in Japanese. I'm glad they're made available in English.
customer_reviews.author: Trixia Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Tamagotchi On :-)
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 days to finally decide to spend a whole $65 on this (we a broke college student...I, a clown). I never had a Tamagotchi when I was a kid bc my parents never let me so now that I'm an adult I decided why not it's what 7 year old me deserves !! I ordered the fairy blue one & it came to me in perfect condition :-) Despite the fact that I'm probably gonna be eating air with a side of water for the next 2 weeks I recommend getting it esp if u never owned one as a kid like me :')
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I'm too old
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old Tamagotchi when I was a kid. Fed it, cared for it, eventually it pooped on itself and eventually died. Well, I'm an adult now, and I have a family that I need to feed, and care for, and when they poop on themselves I have to clean it - NOT my Tamagotchi. Anyhow, aside from not having enough time to take care of my digital pet, the box arrived 2 weeks late - after the time it was intended as a gift for. On top of that, the box itself came damaged. Overall, this was a poor experience across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Nic P

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality...
customer_reviews.text: Look. I wanted to like this. But after I got it, I'm like "wow, I spent 60 dollars on this...Oh, there are dead pixels on it already? Straight out of the box? Cool. Oh there's scratches on the screen already? Cool...". For 30 bucks I'd totally be fine. But 60? I returned this and got something worth the money. You could legit buy an actual video game for 60 bucks. Just an honest review of my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Used????
customer_reviews.text: Mine came as expected. Light scratches. I can’t even get the batteries in because the screw is already stripped!!!!! Why did i pay full price?????
customer_reviews.author: daryan

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on 'new' product (twice)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered TWO Tamagotchis after the first arrived with scratches on the screen. Not only did the second have this same issue (plus debris under the screen) but the box was damaged this time too. Yes, the device functions but when 100% of its function is through an already tiny screen, it needs to be near perfect. Just be aware that the first few batches are going to be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Felscream

customer_reviews.title: Pros: Great picture and tamagotchis, Cons: battery life and app
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. Combinations are endless, compared to the twenty or so you could do in the first few. There are only a few minigames and the ones unlocked from traveling are too much of a bother to get too. The app that is available is good for marrying, but it's very cheaply made. Battery life also last about 2.5 weeks for me which is pretty concerning. Other than that the tamagotchi itself is pretty and is very great
customer_reviews.author: zim

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition! Would make a great gift for any age and gender! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Arrived in perfect condition with no scratches or anything! However, make sure you have aaa batteries and a small screwdriver- I used one for glasses. I am in my twenties and have been glued to this device, my boyfriend loves it, and my little sister who is under 10 also wants one, so it definitely appeals to a wide age and gender group! Color and illustrations are absolutely fantastic. No problems trying to see or read the screen. The app doesn’t have any purchases whatsoever. I think this product was worth every penny and would make a great Christmas present for any age and gender!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for, no damage.
customer_reviews.text: So to be fully honest it is what it is. I've been using it and is pretty good I would say it could be better if it was for half the price it's listed as but jokes on me I guess and had to buy it. Some people said they got theirs with scratches on them. I guess by chance I didn't have tht happen. Was completely clean of any scratches Make sure to buy AAA batteries and get ahold of a small screwdriver I just bought cheap ones and will see how they last EDIT: two weeks and one day, battery hasn't ran out yet
customer_reviews.author: ~MrsBeth7~

customer_reviews.title: My Daughters Love the Tamagotchi Virtual Pet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a retro toy and my daughters love their Tamagotchis! I purchased them for my youngest daughter's birthday. The package has instructions on connecting the Tamagotchi to the online environment. My girls learned how to extend the "lives" and personas of the Tamagotchi by connecting them to the "My Tamagotchi Forever" app. I was so surprised at the joy the girls experienced. There are endless possibilities as the girls have arranged playdates, parties and so much more. I highly recommend this product. The picture is of my daughters discussing tips on their "pets".
customer_reviews.author: DCBikingMama

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: The updated Tamagotchi is a lot of fun. If you never owned one before it would be nice if it had a better tutorial, but it does come with an instruction booklet. I had to surf the web to find some helpful sites about how to unlock the different locations, change colors, etc. The $60 price tag is worth it, however you may want to invest in dollar store batteries. With average use the battery lasts 7 days. I've used good brand name and cheapo ones and it was still one week. That's the only downside is if you plan on playing for a long time, get yourself a good size pack of batteries so you have them on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyrena

customer_reviews.title: A really cute tama with creative new content - adventure lies ahead
customer_reviews.text: Held my breath when I opened it but it's beautiful and perfect. No issues with installing batteries - easy peasy. Screen is crispy clear. Has directions, but I'll wander around a bit first. The first-gen characters are not making my socks go up and down; can't wait to see what I can cook up in the gene lab. Having fun in the meantime. Haven't connected yet but eventually will. (Aware about requirement to unlock destinations and battery life issue reports but OK with both.) Will revise if necessary. ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Screen but fun!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a box. I've heard that the Ons have been arriving with scratched screens and I am one of the people who got a scratched screen. $60+ is a lot of money to pay for an item with a scratched screen. I didn't bother sending it back because from what I've heard, they all seem to have scratches. As far as the game goes, its a lot of fun! I ended up going to Amazon Japan and ordering the Fantasy Meets. It's in Japanese what the menus are basically the same. I also ended up finding a few others with English patches. I now have a new addiction. 😂
customer_reviews.author: SumTea

customer_reviews.title: LOVED by the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for my 34th birthday. We thought it was pricey at the time but it really is a great toy. The tamagotchi connects via bluetooth to an app for even more fun. It grows up, travels, play games, plays with toys, eats and goes potty. You can get it married and get a new tama baby after it grows into an adult. Takes 2 AAA batteries which it goes through pretty fast. The entire family passes it around to take care of it, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what it is. There are extra features compared to past versions, but it's not as intuitive, and some of the 'locked' features remain unachievable. The games are boring and do not have enough variation. The idea of connecting to an app is really cool, but they just don't have a lot on there to make it interesting or worthwhile to connect. If you're looking for a good Tamagotchi, I would recommend version 4.5, or the Tamagotchi P's. I bought this for nostalgia, I had at least 5 different Tamas in grade school and I was severely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts off e oufh content to not justify the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely disappointed to find out today the US version cut off contents and only left the Wonderland area in there when the JP version has three and offers new characters in each while more or less at the same cost. Had I known before today I wouldn't have bothered getting the US version.
customer_reviews.author: Rosenel

customer_reviews.title: ENDURING fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Tamagotchi fan since the very beginning, but no Tamagotchi has held my interest for as long as the new ONs/Meets (Japanese versions). Being able to use the app to find partners and breed new Tamagotchi that share their parents' traits is what makes this so fun. I think I'm on the 20th generation for mine. The UI does lag a little, and sometimes there are annoying extra steps (like to get to the place where you play games), but I'm so used to it now it doesn't bother me. I run like four of these at a time now!
customer_reviews.author: AttackOfTheFries

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but maybe sold as new when it’s not...
customer_reviews.text: I just read the other review which confirms my suspicions that these were used somehow. My box arrived ripped, tape cut... in such a way that just crushing in transport wouldn’t cause. No scratches on mine, but it does have a dead pixel from the get go, which is a little annoying given the steep cost. However the gameplay itself and screen brightness is great and not as annoying or needy as I remember the original tamagotchis being.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Great, too much packaging
customer_reviews.text: The tamagotchi itself is perfect and exactly what I expected. It's been many years since I last owned any tamagotchis, so it's nice that they finally come in color. It is thicker than the original first few iterations of tamagotchis, probably because it needs 2 AAA batteries and has bluetooth capabilities too now. As for the tamagotchi itself, since there's no longer a TamaTown, you can connect it online via an app to see other tamagotchis. The packaging itself was incredibly excessive and wasteful for just a small egg-shaped device and a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, for no good reason.
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is just ok, it is easy to operate and it is fun to see all of the evolutions to adulthood. After that the little games you can play only keep you entertained for so long. I would understand the price of this thing if it was rechargeable. We got the Tamagotchi On for my daughter 2 months ago and I have already had to change the batteries 3 times and the little screw in the back is a such pain to unscrew.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Best tamagotchi on released so far!
customer_reviews.text: I got this item almost a month ago. I love this product very much! I would say that the button response time is slightly better then on the other magical on and fairy ons! I would be happy if they were as responsive as the mixes. But they aren’t but I can deal with it. So I think I prefer this device over the other two tamagotchi ons! Love the gameplay and the mixeable characters! Very cute Alice and wonderland theme. I would say if your really into Alice in wonderland , or tamagotchi collecting, this is what you would want! The most beautiful on shell I have!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Penney

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: OMG so cool they brought these back and added more features. I love this! I actually got the pink for my friend for xmas and she got me the green one! My cousin bought the white one. So much fun to play and connect to other tamas and the app. The app on phone needs an upgrade cause I think they can add little more to do, but it's nice to go on and see the different tamas. I love how you can marry them. And cool to be able to keep pets and marry them too. I love how it is in color now to. We're all in our 30s but this makes us feel like kids again haha.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute design and the game plays really well. It was more of a nostalgia thing for me but it plays really nicely and is fun. I recommend for older kids because it would be easy to lose and provably harder for younger kids to understand how to play with it. The app is ok it’s pretty boring and honestly I really wanted more from the app like more mini games or something but it’s like 2 mini games and a dating thing to find a partner for you pet.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: There's always dust
customer_reviews.text: So first Tama had dust on it and there was a broken hinge in the back. There was also a dead pixel. The second one that came in had dust as well, but it came in perfect condition. To remove dust, just screw off the backplate, then remove 4 screws holding the tama together. then use compressed air or just blow out the dust and put it together again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Soo FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Tamagotchi ON not knowing anything about it. I’ve always been a huge fan of GigaPets. In the picture, you can see a big difference in the Salem GigaPet graphics vs. the Tamagotchi. This thing is so fun. There are tons if things to do and the graphics are WOW. It takes 2 AAA batteries, which are not included FYI. I’m very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Glycerine

customer_reviews.title: Not your 90s Tamagotchi
customer_reviews.text: Fun upgrade from the OG version. Great for kids and adults. Color screen is amazing, but the Bluetooth eats up the batteries. Recommend using rechargeable batteries. Fun to connect with the app. This will give you access to international players and variations not available to each version. If you don't know anyone else with a tamagotchi, prepare to not unlock everything. I recommend buying one Magic and one Fairy edition if you plan on having two. DO NOT use the bootleg app that will alter your tama! It will corrupt your tama, giving them no faces or other issues.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Little toy packed with things to do!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition. I also own the Tamagotchi P, so this is my first Tamagotchi that is "US" released. Very in-depth game, with lots to do. Was so excited the US finally released one in full color. Love that you're able to connect to an app. You never run out of things to do, and there's always little surprises waiting for you :) I'm tempted to buy a second one so I can connect them, but I'll have to wait a little longer since I'm not made of money, haha. It's truly a wonderful lil toy though! <3
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Game is great, battery won't last more a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: You should also buy rechargeable batteries with this purchase, since it has a ton of functionalities and color screen it drains battery fast. Expect to change the batteries very often. Good news are that even if the batteries die, the game won't reset so you can resume once you replace them. Battery life is around 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cirious

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but I got one with lines/scratches inside the display
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tamagotchi, it brings back memories and this one has so many more options than the very first version. It keeps me entertained for a long time and I am 36 years, 😄 The only thing I did not like was that it had some scratches on the display. It seems like they are on the inside and I can not feel them on the outside. A little disappointing when you get a brand new product. I just see a big difference when I purchased my sons Tama at the store today and his screen is without any scratches whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Love this new addition to my collection!
customer_reviews.text: I've been collecting japan tamagotchi since they left the USA, so to hear there was a localized one on the way was like a heaven send. It's adorable, fully translated, full colored, and can even connect to an app to see other peoples tamagotchis. The breeding mechanic is as wonderful as ever and effects pets too! They're a bit harder to take care of than the previous generations, in my opinion, but that makes them more rewarding each generation. The only issues I had was the packaging was a little wasteful, and the price is still high. Not as high as importing, thank god.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: One expensive egg in the trash...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I hate this thing. My little one wanted it for Christmas. The app is not compatible with the Amazon kids tablet. The three buttons are so frustrating. And it keeps dying. It also takes a AAA battery. The screen is vibrant with color, and the background does change depending on the holiday. If you are a tamagotchi enthusiast then go for it. But if you are a parent with young kids, it's just a frustrating headache waiting to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Nyu Shadowfox

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing But...
customer_reviews.text: It came with light scratches on the screen and around the back and has like dust particles underneath the screen. You would expect it to be perfect when its supposed to be new and with such high price. Also note that when you connect it with the app theres not much to do, just two mini games, hopefully more updates soon. Other than that it looks great and works great as well. (Note: The second picture shows my phone's reflection on the screen)
customer_reviews.author: Arlene970

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the best!! I got the purple magic so my special land I unlock for my gotchi is the magic land. It’s super fun to play and it’s a bonus to be able to have the app too so you can have free “daycare” when you’re busy and go to meet other tama to get married and such. Amazing! Does go through batteries kind of fast though so keep AAA on hand and a tiny screwdriver. You won’t lose your tama either, you just choose to resume
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: POOR BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: The battery life has killed this generation. I was so happy that they were bringing back an english version but the batteries die in about 2 weeks. For $50 it should last a year. This horrific battery life is the main reason im giving it 2 stars. Also, you have to visit two other tama's in order to unlock one location. This is just mean. Im not going to spend another $50 just to get a second tamagotchi so I can visit sport town. They should make an alternative way to see it, like use the app 5 times. I was excited to re-live this childhood memory but it was just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very cute & fun but not worth $59
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this thing is worth $60 but it’s been on YouTube and kids will pay anything for toys that they see unboxed on YouTube. We preordered this, my daughter got the pink one. It’s really light and feels cheap but the game works and is very cute. My daughter loves it and hasn’t put it down. It’s really hard to learn to navigate at first but she’s getting the hang of it. I think she would have been just as happy with a smaller less expensive version. But this one is still pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Crownme

customer_reviews.title: Love the Amazon Exclusive White Version
customer_reviews.text: Such cool device. It has a great solid feel, and the buttons feel nice too. Thought I wouldn't like the larger size but it actually is kinda nice to hold and use because of that. I grew up right as Tamagotchi hit the market so I've got a nostalgic sweet spot for virtual pets. I held off buying the color variants because of them all being in Japanese, very cool to see Bandai doing more US releases.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in loooooove with my Tamagotchi On!! It’s so much fun and pocket size so I can easily bring it with me everywhere. The box came with a dent in it as pictured but other then that it’s in perfect working order! If you love Tamagotchis or haven’t had one and are curious, definitely go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: I like this product even though it took longer then what was said to get to me. Now i have the puple magic one as well and love the both..no don't like the surfing game though it feels like in time it might break the machine
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth the money. It kills the battery within 3 days. These are 2 AA batteries, not a rechargeable item. At this point the kids have already stopped playing with it and Christmas was only 2 weeks ago. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, shipped in bubble envelopes though
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy, and I am really glad that Bandai have finally decided to localise colour screen Tamagotchi. There is a lot to do, the gameplay is fun, I'm really enjoying it. A minor peeve, but: 1. The screen has scuffs on it (I'm not sure if that's from the factory or the shipping) 2. These are expensive, and rightfully so, however they are mailed out in flimsy bubble envelopes, which has caused some kind of damage to 2/4 product boxes so far. Some of us like to keep our boxes for collection purposes. Anyway, bottom line, thankyou Bandai for making these available in English finally, and please bring us more in future.
customer_reviews.author: Dean S.

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Screen/Pixelated Blur - Works Though!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second tamagotchi I bought and the gifted one was a little better, but the other one has a damaged screen when the screen is lit up but has a black screen. There are pixelated streaks running across the screen before it turns on. A shame! Nonetheless, the actual technology is perfect and runs well.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie G

customer_reviews.title: VERY bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Photos were taken straight out of brand new sealed packages, the screens all come heavily pre scratched. This honestly feels unacceptable how bandai is selling this type of quality for this price, feels awful knowing i paid for this but the tamagotchis themselves work fine except for a lot of lag with the buttons responding. One of the screens have a yellow tint/hue compared to the other one's which is a bit annoying cause white colors look more yellowish. I would have returned these but seeing that everyone else also got theirs pre scratched i just didnt bother. really hope something serious gets done about bandai selling these cause this feels scammy.
customer_reviews.author: Malin

customer_reviews.title: Great Virtual Pet
customer_reviews.text: I like that this tamagotchi because like that it had an on/off button for the sound. I like that it was a fun toy that fit my personality and how if it is a easy responsibility and if my pet died how it wouldn't be a big deal, and that I could start over easily. I recommend this toy for kids around age 8 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Christy H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I love having my own tamagotchi I never had one growing up for some reason I must not have wanted one but I absolutely love this pink one My friend even made a case for me to put around it! Battery life is about 12 days or so and since I didn't want to keep buying batteries I ended up getting rechargeable ones which has helped a lot! Love using the app as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stuthard-Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but might be difficult to use right off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my almost 8yr old daughter. I immediately was slightly disappointed to find out you still had to use batteries and that they didn’t upgrade to a rechargeable device, but I guess that was my fault for not reading to see. When you put the batteries in you have to set the date , Birthday and your child’s name. Which I found to be slightly difficult to figure out how to do. But once you get the hang of it, it gets easier. I would say this device is definitely for 8yrs and above.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H

customer_reviews.title: I love ‘em!! Best versions so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe tamagotchi addiction! I purchased 4 of these 2 fairy and 2 magic (one of each color) and these are my favorites by far! They are actually easier to use than any other version I’ve encountered. I love the backlit color display! It does eat up batteries. I’ve played for 3 weeks and I’m on my 2nd set of new batteries. (The pink bunny lied!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The next generation of the classic.
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot to do in this little egg. 8 different small worlds, each with shops and games. Millions of combinations for your pet to grow into alongside more stuff to do in the app. Battery life is great and lasts around three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Picklesniffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!! Every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This toy is everything. I'm an adult nostalgic for my old 1997 toys... And this is great. Colors vivid, play complex enough to be fun as an adult. It literally makes me smile all throughout the day while I'm working. I love the ability to have it walk into my phone!! I want to get more for my family members so we can play together. The song is catchy. I wish there were more cute cases-- but this is a new thing. They'll come later I think.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tamagotchi! I have been wanting one ever since I was a kid and I finally am able to afford them as an adult! Everything came packaged well, the box has zero damage to it and it works wonderfully. The only reason I am giving this 4 stars overall is because the screen came with little tiny scratches? It isn't very noticeable and it doesn't bother me but I figured id mention it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Big price, little satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I feel that the company did not do any research to improve upon the original model. The creature is hard to program with your child's name, and then it is difficult and time-consuming to take care of. The creature died several times. It doesn't seem to be that different from the kind that was sold 25 years ago. Not worth the cost, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Happynest

customer_reviews.title: My first Tamagotchi & I’m obsessed 😊
customer_reviews.text: So so cute!!! 💕🌈 I love it! The packaging was so adorable and it came in the cutest little amazon box. As soon as I took it out of the packaging I was so super in love with it.. it’s small and fits perfectly in my hand. The screen came a little scratched but you can’t see them undress your really trying to. I’m so obsessed I must of made like 10 Snapchat stories about it already. & I got the most perfect Tama baby she’s the cutest little thing!! So happy with this purchase... little does my boyfriend know... he just started something crazy in me and I just might have to collect em all! 😝💕💖💗🌸🌈
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay far away if you want any sort of real life!
customer_reviews.text: We spent way too much on this. I played with it way more than my daughter did just so the thing wouldn't die. She's killed it three times in a month because after I went back to work after the holidays, there was no one to keep a constant eye on the thing. This takes WAY more attention than it should to keep alive, almost like it's trying to teach kids dependency on electronics, which I'm not a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary N.

customer_reviews.title: Brought Back My Childhood
customer_reviews.text: I just received today the shipping was absolutely fast! I was really hesitant on buying this at first but I’m happy I did I use to have tamagotchis when I was younger (black/white ver) this is definitely a total upgrade and fun to play I feel like I’m reliving my childhood and am happy with this purchase that I’m already considering buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Jaynalyn Nakagawa

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic toy but with TONs of improvements
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas thinking it was just a slightly more up to date version of the classic. It is now almost a month and she has been playing it everyday. There are tons of new features and is WAY more advanced than the classic Tamagotchi. I love that it has a backlit color screen. There are constantly new surprises and it's amazing how many generations of tama you can raise. Highly recommended for kids AND adults!
customer_reviews.author: aZhu

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and Laggy
customer_reviews.text: The product came pretty terribly scratched up right out of the package. On top of this, the interface is really laggy compared to older tamagotchi versions. I have collected these guys since I was a child and I do love the backlit screen and vibrant colors, but the scratches and lag make playing this difficult and not so fun. It's a pretty expensive toy for such bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Media Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Kids love, parents do not
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced IMO. Fun little toy for my kids but it just doesn't do that much to justify the price and they're so small I fear they will get lost. Also, there is no shutting off, if the kids leave the toy at home to go to school or out for the day, their tomagatchi character dies which results in upset,crying kids, it's annoying to reset regularly. Now my kids want to take this everywhere and cried going to school because it will die there must be a feature to keep this thing alive...like babysitter feature I'm missing....horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Repose

customer_reviews.title: My PreTeen Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (11 years old) absolutely loves this, I got her one because I had one when I was a bit younger than her. It’s not died yet and she’s been on it for about 6 days now. So cute, she’s having a lot of fun watching her pet evolve marry and have children etc... I have not used the app with it yet though.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteOleander

customer_reviews.title: So cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved tamagotchis and was thrilled to see color tamas finally got an English release, so i immediately bought two. Highly recommenced for anyone who loved tamas when they were a kid or if you want an English version of your favorite Japanese imported tamagotchis.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Even better than the original
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one of these when I was a kid and it was the perfect gift to get my kids to behave and during the shelter in place. They have been at each other's throats the past week but with a little bit of leverage life has gotten better. Both my daughter and my son absolutely love this as well as myself I love the Nostalgia with these new series
customer_reviews.author: Foosvapes

customer_reviews.title: I love the Tamagotchi on so much and I recommend it for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: The Tamagotchi on is great for all children all ages and maybe adults. It does not need 24/7 care and its the best trip toy I can thank of. The battery lasts about 9 days or longer . The app is free and good for seeing other peoples tamas. Its not hard to use and they can be so cute !
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gibson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game so much!! After 3 months I'm still addicted and it is definitely better than the original. I bought it out of nostalgia but ended up happier with the new version!! Definitely buy this if you miss your old Tama!!
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia turned collection
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these as a kid of the 90's & many of the knock off variants. I adore the color screen & fell in love so much I bought a Sanrio meets version (Japanese variant of the same thing) & am planning on buying more! My biggest suggestion if you plan on getting one is to pick up rechargeable aaa batteries since the average lifespan is about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: New out of box with scratches??
customer_reviews.text: Order this last night and wasn’t expecting it for another day. Came early so yay about that! I was hopeful, despite the other reviews complaining about the same things, but unfortunately got one with a scratch screen. How does this one even happen?
customer_reviews.author: Lana T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So glad they finally made these tamagotchis in English :) the purple is super pretty! Mine had a little dust behind the screen but luckily I didn’t have to take anything apart, I just smacked it against my hand a couple times and it moved out of the screen. Overall I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Paul

customer_reviews.title: Is it a USED product??
customer_reviews.text: Like the color, designs and such of tamagotchi on and was excited and happy. But soon after I checked on the product it is disappointing to see lightly scratched marks on its screen. This product I received just yesterday, Singapore. It costs me $96+ SGD, USD is $67+. Actually I didnt intend to get from online but I have no choice as I'm a Tams lover. If not I would have bought from shops in Singapore. But is very limited. :(
customer_reviews.author: Woolala

customer_reviews.title: Don't order if you want undamaged and nice package
customer_reviews.text: Two stars, I bought two prior and they were great. This last one they put in a bubble mailer and is damaged and device is damaged and it was an open package not sealed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Wingler

customer_reviews.title: Super cute worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So this is $50+ so I was super hesitant about spending this much on memory lane but I’m impressed! I am an adult that owns this and it is honestly so fun to play with and there is so much to do or figure out. I love it I’m happy with my purchase and if you are into tamagotchi I recommend it to any age !
customer_reviews.author: lovely

customer_reviews.title: So much to do!
customer_reviews.text: I love how much you can do in this tamagotchi version! The color screen is lovely and something I've never seen in another digital pet. My favorite part is the marriage option, you can create all kinds of tamagotchi combinations. My current tamagotchi is a cute combo of a ninja and a fairy! :) So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: User99

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! She’s played with It almost every day since Christmas and battery is still good. If you download the app there are even more things the Tamagochi can do. Word of caution...the virtual pet dies quickly if the owner doesn’t take care of it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Adeogun

customer_reviews.title: Love my little friend
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my new friend. The tamagotchi itself is super cool, the whole community is really nice. The "shell" is good, really steady and easy to hold, the screen(!) had some scratches and some weird spots under the screen itself, not super happy about that but it hasn't been super distracting. Overall really happy with it, you pay for the design and for the mini game, which is pretty cool. I'm thinking of getting one for my sister so we can play together
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Really Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because the box arrived damaged. Don't know if it was from seller or crappy usps employees though. But the Tamagotchi arrived perfectly fine. No scratches or anything bad. I'm a collector, so the boxes are important to me as well. So i am a bit disappointing on that part. Also, pre ordered, prime and all, and it arrived two weeks later than release date.
customer_reviews.author: Ginalis R.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a tamagotchi since I was like 8. They have made massive improvements, the colors are vibrant, the friend feature is super cool, overall a great toy. If you loved the original tamagotchi you will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: very exciting
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality and packaging! Very excited about it and already very invested into my tama. It ate up some dollar tree batteries super fast (1.5 days) with app connection only once so perhaps it is worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Gao

customer_reviews.title: Screen came scratched!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Tama. I used to have the connections so this color Tama is very cute. However, the product came scratched on the screen. I opened the box and the first thing I noticed was that the screen was already scratched. There is also a piece of dirt or dust under the screen and it’s a little annoying. This never used to happen on the connections so I wonder why it happened with these :( otherwise, I’m having lots of fun with it, i just wish the product didn’t come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxx

customer_reviews.title: SO SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started playing with my old Tamagatchi from 2010 and the screen was black and white and hard to see. With the self quarantine going on, we decided to treat her with a brand new one. The colors and details are amazing. Everything is super cute, from the bows to the backgrounds and even the cute scenes you can buy. Love it and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Jimenez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY CONTROL IS LACKING...
customer_reviews.text: pros: Its tamagotchi and a good localization con: My tamagotchi has dust and debris inside as well as scratches on the outside What to do to fix it easily unscrew it as show in picture its a small board cant mess it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian customer

customer_reviews.title: English colored tamagotchi
customer_reviews.text: Everything I was hoping for and more. The connectivity to the app is very good. It adds an even better way to get unique characters as you can find other people’s tamas to marry. You can also connect to all the Japanese meets versions but not the mix. So happy they created it in English for sale in the US, can’t wait to get the magical version.
customer_reviews.author: Shumoka

customer_reviews.title: Scratch-able!
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome BUT I knocked a star off due to the screen is extremely scratch able... like don’t even put it in your pocket or on a keychain, smalllll swirls like on a car will happen! I hope someone comes out with a screen protector or egg case quickly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: i’ve been a long. time collector and this is a great addition!! as a few other people said it came slightlyscratched on the display but it’s barely noticeable. case from bugadoodles1 on etsy 💞
customer_reviews.author: lil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tamagotchi, the purple color is so beautiful. Love the nostalgia
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: This tamagotchi has the most features compared to any tamagotchi game. It's great and has customization too! The battery life is the worst though and I was disappointed in that, but I guess it's excuse is there's so many features. There is no pause button, so the battery just basically drains all night :(. Still the best tamagotchi experience at this time though.
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: Fun!  But needs AAA batteries and and a special screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Vary fun. Better then what I expected. It's great with the App for it too. Didn't know it needed AAA batteries and a special screwdriver tho.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue fairy + pink fairy On and they both look amazing and work perfectly fine. I thought I noticed a few scratches on the back when I opened them up, but if I did they were extremely faint. I can't really see them anymore. Overall I'm pleased and happy the west got an english color tamagotchi! Might look into buying a green Magic in the future.
customer_reviews.author: jadedHeart

customer_reviews.title: Fun but hard to figure out
customer_reviews.text: So fun to bring back my Childhood toys to share with my kids. They have done quite the upgrade. I wish there was more info on how to do things and get New levels but it seems just as many people are lost at doing the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing depth
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little device. This is a full blown digital pet. The triggers for various evolutions and pets are subtle and complex enough to seen almost organic. I’m considering buying a second color for my girlfriend so that I can finally spend some time with my purple tama! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ian Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Love!!! But...
customer_reviews.text: I freakin love this thing! I grew up on the Tamagotchi connections and finally having a colored screen in the states, it's amazing! I do gotta knock off one star though because when it arrived, it had a deep scratch on the top right corner of the screen AND the screen in general gets scratched up easily. Other than that, I love it! I just hope we can get the Sanrio M!x in English too!!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I just got my tamagotchi's and I must say I'm very pleased! I'm a 90s kid so I remember when they gave tamagotchi as a prize for ordering a happy meal! This is a huge upgrade though, and I connected both of my tamagotchi's to the app and you get free gifts & $$ that you can use on the in store in tamagotchi town.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't get it but my kids have not put it down. Think the packaging is a little excessive and price ehh but wasn't a purchase for myself and my daughter is head over heels in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Tamagotchi! So adorable, and I want to get all the colors. I'm so glad this one is in English too, it makes things much easier for me and I finally get to be able to see what the characters are saying to one another! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Scilla

customer_reviews.title: Very cute design but has discounted content compared to Japanese version
customer_reviews.text: I already have the Japanese version but still bought the US versions coz of the absolutely cute exterior design!! The gameplay is good tho the cut down in content compared to the Japanese version is a bit of a downer Also slightly disappointed the plastic cage in 2 out of my 3 orders came dented despite the fact that my order was delivered in a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Hklalala

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for her 10th birthday. This is perfect all the way around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: This appears to have been a returned item. Fortunately it works and my daughter doesnt know she got something used, but i won't buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: ghskid06

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent kids love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a BIG hit with the 11 year old. This little gadget is amazing for what it can do. Money well spent ... it was a hit for Christmas. And no WiFi all using her own imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a kid again!
customer_reviews.text: As a true 90s kid at heart, let me tell you how excited I was when I found out my beloved Tamagotchis were back in an updated take! I immediately ordered the Magic white for myself, and a Magic green for my cousins. He got his yesterday, mine today, and we are SO THRILLED.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Nioi

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as when I was a kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old who really wanted one. It is a lot more complex then the ones we had growing up, so the instructions are a must read. She is still struggling with it a bit, but with time she’ll get the hang of it. Must have patience and a willingness to answer repeated questions and frequent instruction check. I cannot stress enough to not throw out the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Great product and super cute! 10/10 recommend! I got the fairy one and I’m not disappointed ❤️ (Mines currently sleeping) edit: PLEASE HELP THE SCREEN IS HALF BLACK AND BROKEN
customer_reviews.author: Anime girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Update to a Classic
customer_reviews.text: Nice to see these in color, and a little bigger size. Has kept the girlfriend entertained during quarantine. We do have a hard time keeping them alive though! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

product_meta.title: Tamagotchi On - Fairy (Pink)
product_meta.description: Color:Fairy PinkTamagotchi is back with the next generation of the interactive virtual pet called Tamagotchi On with a fairy theme and a pink shell. Nurture your Tamagotchi character and explore Tamagotchi Planet. There are various activities to keep your character happy including marrying to raise your next My Tama which has features from both of its parents. There are millions of My Tama characters each with their own unique look! You can also connect to your friend’s Tamagotchi On or the Tamagotchi On App for even more things to do. The next generation of kids will be excited to have their own digital pet! Ages 6+
feature_bullets: Tamagotchi on is the next generation of the interactive virtual pet! Take care of your My tama: feed it, clean up after it, help it make friends, get a tama pet, go shopping, travel and more! The fairy theme comes with an exclusive land and 2 exclusive characters

Marry to build your family tree! When your Tamagotchi character gets married, your next generation character (your My tama) will be born and will have features from both of their parents! Are the eyes from mom or dad? What about the body shape? What will it look like?
Connect to your friend's Tamagotchi on device and go on playdates, give gifts, travel together and marry. Play games to win got chi points to buy food, items and accessories
Connect to the Tamagotchi on app to see other unique Tamagotchi characters, get married, meet up with friends, play a game for got chi points and other gifts to bring back to your device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,841 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
